Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system the Lieutenant Commander Phillip Wayne Johnson Memorial Bridge
Summary: Designates the Waverly Ave overpass at Sunrise Highway near exit 52 in town of Brookhaven, Suffolk county, as the "Lieutenant Commander Phillip Wayne Johnson Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system the "Lieutenant Commander Phillip Wayne Johnson Memorial Bridge"
